00165     /**
00166      * Process a TYPO3 path
00167      * 
00168      * This method will process TYPO3 path prefixes, like 'EXT:'.
00169      * 
00170      * @param   string  The path to process
00171      * @return  string  The processed path
00172      */
00173     public static function getWebPath( $path )
00174     {
00175         // Matches array for the preg_match function
00176         $matches = array();
00177         
00178         // Checks if the path is relative to an extension
00179         preg_match( '/^EXT:([^\/]+)/', $path, $matches );
00180         
00181         // Checks if an extension was found
00182         if( isset( $matches[ 1 ] ) ) {
00183             
00184             // Gets the extension path
00185             $extPath = t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath( $matches[ 1 ] );
00186             
00187             // Replaces the extension path
00188             $path    = str_replace( 'EXT:' . $matches[ 1 ] . '/', $extPath, $path );
00189         }
00190         
00191         // Returns the processed path
00192         return $path;
00193     }
00194     
00195     /**

00201     }
